value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Thank you for saving our people,
Lady Nifl. I am forever in your debt.$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Do not trouble yourself, Hvergel.
It is my pleasure to bless you with
the power in my blood.$k$pIt was you who thawed my
long-frozen heart, showed me the
kindness mortals are capable of...$k$pThough your mortal life must one
day end, our connection will live
on through eternity.$k$pI promise to cherish your children
and their children just as I care
for you.$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Lady Nifl... I am sure
my children will appreciate your
presence as I have...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$pWas that...a dream? That was...
Lady Nifl, long ago. And the one
with her was...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Why are you delaying, Fjorm?
We must hurry.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|O-of course! ...Though there is
something I want to ask you about,
Lady Nifl...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|What is your question? I pray it
does not require a lengthy answer.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|There was a time you granted an
ancestor of mine, the first queen,
the power to save her people...$k$pWhy? Why grant mortals power
at all?$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Did you have some connection
with our first queen—Hvergel?$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Silence. Such things are none
of your concern.$k$pNow, keep marching. Should your
mouth continue to babble, I will be
forced to freeze it shut.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Y-you would do that?$k$pPlease forgive me...$k$pThe Lady Nifl of my dream is entirely
different from the Lady Nifl here in
front of me... What changed?$k$p

$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Quickly, Fjorm. We must reach our
foe's keep before Múspell regains
his power.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Um... Lady Nifl? There's something
I want to ask you about...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Silence. As I said, we must hurry.$k$pYou would do well to listen, lest
I am forced to encase you in ice
and leave you behind.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It's just that...I had a strange vision.$k$pIt was almost like a dream. And you
were speaking with Queen Hvergel,
as if the two of you were close...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p...You are the heir of two bloods.$k$pThe mortal blood of Queen Hvergel
and the dragon blood I granted her...
That is likely the vision's cause.$k$pYour resemblance to her is...strong.
As if she were born anew... I find it
rather unpleasant.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You seemed so happy in my vision...
You were even smiling!$k$pI know you said that you dislike
emotionality, but it seemed like,
back then, you...$k$pI hesitate to say, but it appeared
to me as if you had a deep love
for mortals...$k$pI was glad to see what a kind person
you can be...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm...$k$pYou are near to finding yourself
entombed under an avalanche.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I— Wh-what?! I'm just trying to
express my gratitude for—$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|The past is behind us. I will never
hold any love or fondness for another
mortal. Not again.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-why...?$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Back then, I was unaware of what
pain I would face in eventually losing
one I love. Now I know.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry, Lady Nifl...$k$pIt's true that we mortals cannot
live forever. Our life's force will
always eventually exhaust itself...$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|No.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...N-no?$k$p$WmMPID_ニフル味方,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|You misunderstand. Because of her
connection to me... Because of ME...$k$pHvergel was taken by Múspell's
abominable flame...$k$p$Fo1500,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|AAAHHHH! Th-this heat! It burns!
I cannot—$k$pI cannot...I cannot see...
I...I cannot breathe!
I— Nifl!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|No, no, no... Hvergel... Please forgive
me... I never meant for this to
happen! ...No...no...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Please... Save...me...$k$pHelp me... I...beg you...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|I am so sorry, Hvergel, but I can
do nothing now...$k$pA body burned by Múspell's flame
cannot be healed... Not even by
my power...$k$pThe only solace I can offer is release
from the inferno within you...$k$pMúspell... You chose not to deal me
a final blow on purpose...$k$pYou wanted me...to see what you'd
done to Hvergel...knowing I would
be forced to end her suffering...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...Nifl, I...$k$p...$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Hvergel!$k$pMy love was not enough to protect
you and instead drove us here, where
I must take your life myself!$k$pNo one must ever suffer the same
terrible fate... If it means bearing
such a burden, I will love no more.$k$pI am sorry I will not be able to keep
my promise of loving your children,
Hvergel... Instead, I promise this...$k$pEven if I am forced to murder that
immortal bastard a thousand times...
I swear to bring an end to Múspell.$k$p
